column2: "Hiiiiii! It's me, the lovable and vivacious Patty, everyone's favorite information dealer!"
"You say that, but who got the information this time?"
"So anyway, in the shop area, I was able to make friends with this easy-going old geezer!"
"It seems like he used to make weapons! So cool, right?"
"That was probably the famous weapon smith, Zieg."
"Patty, as an information dealer, this is really something you should know."
"40 years ago, he was a renowned weapon smith, but lately he's really let himself go."
"The weapon line he created came to be known as Genesis, for what it's worth."
"Genesis? What do you mean by that? Like the first sword ever made or something?"
"They were prototypes so powerful that no one could use them. The weapons we use now are downgraded versions."
"Wow! He can make something like that? Amazing!"
"No, he can't make them. Patty, do try to pay attention, at least occasionally."
"Who cares about the details. Besides, our client gained some information, right?"
"If he's that amazing of a weapon smith, then I should have him make me something."
"I guess you missed the part where I said he's let himself go..."
